mapper.insert: insert into log_day_xh_media_program_new_summary (ID, DATE, SITE_CODE, ORIGIN_ID, CHANNEL_ID, PART_ID, GLOBAL_ID, PLAY_NUMBER, PLAY_USER_NUMBER, COMMENT_NUMBER, COLLECTION_NUMBER, SHARE_NUMBER, TIME_LENGTH, PLAY_TIME, PUB_DATE, CREATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{siteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{globalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{playNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{playUserNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commentNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{collectionNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shareNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{timeLength,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{playTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pubDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update log_day_xh_media_program_new_summary
DATE = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SITE_CODE = #{siteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORIGIN_ID = #{originId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PART_ID = #{partId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GLOBAL_ID = #{globalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLAY_NUMBER = #{playNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PLAY_USER_NUMBER = #{playUserNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COMMENT_NUMBER = #{commentNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COLLECTION_NUMBER = #{collectionNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SHARE_NUMBER = #{shareNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TIME_LENGTH = #{timeLength,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PLAY_TIME = #{playTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PUB_DATE = #{pubDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update log_day_xh_media_program_new_summary set DATE = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SITE_CODE = #{siteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORIGIN_ID = #{originId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PART_ID = #{partId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GLOBAL_ID = #{globalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLAY_NUMBER = #{playNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PLAY_USER_NUMBER = #{playUserNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COMMENT_NUMBER = #{commentNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COLLECTION_NUMBER = #{collectionNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SHARE_NUMBER = #{shareNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TIME_LENGTH = #{timeLength,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PLAY_TIME = #{playTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PUB_DATE = #{pubDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT program.SITE_CODE,program.ORIGIN_ID,program.CHANNEL_ID,program.PART_ID,program.GLOBAL_ID,PLAY_NUMBER,PLAY_USER_NUMBER,COMMENT_NUMBER,COLLECTION_NUMBER,SHARE_NUMBER,program.TIME_LENGTH,PLAY_TIME,FROM_UNIXTIME(program.pub_date) AS pub_date, NAME AS siteName, ORIGIN_NAME AS originName, channel.CHANNEL_NAME AS channelName ,part.CHANNEL_NAME AS partName ,CHINESE_NAME AS programName FROM ((((log_day_xh_media_program_new_summary program INNER JOIN sys_groups groups ON (program.site_code=groups.id)) INNER JOIN index_xh_media_origin origin ON (program.site_code=origin.site_code AND program.origin_id=origin.origin_id)) INNER JOIN index_xh_media_channel channel ON (program.site_code=channel.site_code AND program.origin_id=channel.origin_id AND program.CHANNEL_ID=channel.CHANNEL_ID AND channel.PARENT_ID=-1)) INNER JOIN index_xh_media_channel part ON (program.site_code=part.site_code AND program.origin_id=part.origin_id AND program.CHANNEL_ID=part.PARENT_ID)) INNER JOIN index_xh_media_program indexprogram ON (program.site_code=indexprogram.site_code AND program.CHANNEL_ID=indexprogram.CHANNEL_ID AND program.GLOBAL_ID=indexprogram.GLOBAL_ID)
